      • sightIn

        public static Optional<org.bukkit.Location> sightIn​(org.bukkit.Location location,
                                                    double v,
                                                    double x,
                                                    double y,
                                                    double g)
        Modifies a location to be sighted in to shoot at a particular position along the plane of the view model.
        Parameters:
        location - The original position. WIll be copied.
        v - The speed of the projectile.
        x - The distance between the final point and the origin, in meters.
        y - The height between the final point and the origin, in meters.
        g - The gravity in this space, in m/s.
        Returns:
        The sighted in position. If the point is unable to be reached, an empty Optional is returned.
